title: Print, "Title Page, Nouvelles Cheminée faittes en plusieur en droits (New Designs for Fireplaces)", ca. 1700
medium: Etching and engraving on white laid paper
signed: Signed in plate, lower left: inventé et grave par D. Marot / auec preuillege des Etats generaux des Province Vnies
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, in cartouche: Nouvelles / Cheminée faittes / en plusieur en droits. / _de la Hollande et autres / Provinces du Dessein de / D. Marot Architecte des. / -appartements de sa Majesté / Britanique gravé par / L'Hauteur auec preuillege des / Etats generaux: des / Province Vnie
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: A fireplace decorated with lions flanking an escutcheon with a crowned roundel. Two urns and a bust of a Roman emperor sit on the mantelpiece. Above, oval-shaped cartouche with title and a Doric entablature. Scale below.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Title Page, Nouvelles Cheminée faittes en plusieur en droits (New Designs for Fireplaces)", ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. Etching and engraving on white laid paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-47.
